vl.team07.com.virtuallibrary

Class DatabaseHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • vl.team07.com.virtuallibrary.DatabaseHandler

  • public class DatabaseHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the Firebase Database Handler. This class is designed to handle all the tasks that are related to the Firebase Realtime Database. The TAG is gotten by getting the class name where DatabaseHandler is instantiated and is converted to a simple string.
    Since:
    1.0

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DatabaseHandler(android.content.Context context)
      Constructor for the DatabaseHandler class which takes the context of which class it is in when instantiated.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addBook(Book book)
      This method adds a book to the database using the ISBN as unique child key.
      void addReview(Book book, Review review)
      This method takes in a book object and a review object to add a review to the database under the ISBN of the of clicked book
      void addUser(User user)
      This method takes in a User object and adds it to the database using the values provided during the signUp process
      java.util.ArrayList<Book> retrieveAvailableBook()
      This method retrieves all the books from the database under child Books and returns it as an arraylist of type Boook
